scripts.start:production: npm run-script build && node build/main.js ping --environment=production
scripts.start:staging: npm run-script build && node build/main.js ping --environment=staging
scripts.start:development: npm run-script build && node build/main.js ping --environment=development
scripts.pm2:start:production: npm run-script build && pm2 start process.production
scripts.pm2:start:staging: npm run-script build && pm2 start process.staging
scripts.pm2:start:development: npm run-script build && pm2 start process.development
